VASSAL.build.module.gamepieceimage

Class MedianCut

  • java.lang.Object
    • VASSAL.build.module.gamepieceimage.MedianCut
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class MedianCut
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts an RGB image to 8-bit index color using Heckbert's median-cut color quantization algorithm. Based on median.c by Anton Kruger from the September, 1994 issue of Dr. Dobbs Journal.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Deprecated.

      java.awt.image.BufferedImage convert(int maxcubes)
      Deprecated. 
      Uses Heckbert's median-cut algorithm to divide the color space defined by "hist" into "maxcubes" cubes.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage convertToByte(int maxcubes)
      Deprecated. 
      This is a version of convert that returns a ByteProcessor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MedianCut

        public MedianCut(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Deprecated. 

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage convert(int maxcubes)
        Deprecated. 
        Uses Heckbert's median-cut algorithm to divide the color space defined by "hist" into "maxcubes" cubes. The centroids (average value) of each cube are are used to create a color table. "hist" is then updated to function as an inverse color map that is used to generate an 8-bit image.

      • buildColorModel

        public java.awt.image.IndexColorModel buildColorModel(int maxcubes)
        Deprecated. 

      • convertToByte

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage convertToByte(int maxcubes)
        Deprecated. 
        This is a version of convert that returns a ByteProcessor.
